attributes.title: UGH OH STINKY 🤮
attributes.review: to my fellow trump supporters: do not download this app 🤭 this app gave my cellular device a gnarly virus 🦠  by downloading this app you will extend the stay at home orders by another year 😬 no more hair cuts ever 😳 make sure to not vote this year trump supporters because his votes are all going to biden anyways because of those tic tock kids 😰 those generation zed children are going to send fairy emojis to the electoral college until biden is president 🧚‍♂️✨ - sincerely another BOOMER 😗✌️

attributes.title: WayyYYY to long to download
attributes.review: This app took longer than 48 hours to download and keeps making my phone malfunction! Whenever I open the app it’ll just make my phone shut off and won’t turn back on for 30 minutes 🤬😡 I think they’re using this app to steal my personal information as well and it doesn’t make me feel safe, trump you lost my vote. Horrible, horrible app

attributes.title: Complete bull
attributes.review: After waiting 15 years for it to download when I opened the app I received a death threat and a notification that ICE was going to come to my house because I was deemed illegal. Then after ICE raided my house and tried to deport me, I tried to delete the app and the cops came to the ICE building and started beating everyone in sight after president ordered it. 0/10 would not recommend: bunker boy needs to get better🤡🤡

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The app kept showing me a black screeen while I was trying to show my friends the app but then it started glitching. The app also took 2 1/2 weeks to download and I couldn’t watch any news about our orange president cheeto 🧚🏽🧚🏽✨✨. I also shared the app with my neighbor and she was so interested she forgot to water her plants and now there dead✨✨. This app is so terrible and glitchy and they stole some of my money.

attributes.title: absolute waste of time
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to find out more information about Trump’s 2020 campaign, but unfortunately, this app turned out to be complete trash. It took forever to load, and when it did, there were few factual points about Trump and his administration! I strongly encourage those thinking about giving time out of your day to this underdeveloped garbage to reconsider!

attributes.title: Bleach my eyes
attributes.review: I am scarred for life. I saw this app and downloaded just to check it out and when I opened it immediately showed me the most horrible figure. There was a guy with horrible features and he looked so orange.I started to scream and dropped my phone and my kid saw what was on my phone and got a heart attack and we had to take him to the hospital.I would never ever recommend downloading this app. Ruined my life.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I installed this app with very high expectations, as I was told in the terms and conditions that upon installation I would get to marry and meet Madelyn Cline. As the first 24 hours passed, I still had no Madelyn Cline. My anger and frustration grew more and more as I patiently waited for her. Eventually, I see Madelyn Cline appear on my front lawn. She came up to my front door, walked in and murdered me and my entire family. Yes, I am dead. No, you should not download this app.

attributes.title: Have to have a number
attributes.review: Right when I got on the app, first thing it says Is I have to have a number, and I don’t have service right now, and I’m running on wifi, so I wait a few days till I got service and It’s working now, but It keeps crashing and taking me back to home page, and I waited so long just to not even get to use the app, very bad, and don’t recommend this app.

attributes.title: The Worst App Ever!
attributes.review: Ok so, when I went into the app, it has horrible! All of a sudden we turned into happy birthday balloons! It took a week to become normal again. My food turned into oranges, too! Soup to orange! Water to orange! Anything that is edible is now oranges in my household! My fork has parrot feathers sticked on to it! And my guess who board game has gone wrong since I got the app! This app is dangerous!!! Do not DARE to download, it’s not worth the week of waiting!

attributes.title: 🌈💖🧚‍♂️🌸🧚‍♀️💐🌷🦄
attributes.review:
This app is fire🔥🧚‍♀️💫🌈✨a dumpster fire🧚‍♀️✨💕💫 oh the places trump will go🌈✨🧚‍♀️ never come back🌸✨🧚‍♂️ keep shooting for your campaign🥰🌈🌷💐 then...✨🌸✨claim your seat at the top🧚‍♂️🧚‍♀️🌸 make it S P I C Y🌶🥵💕🌈 you look like you won a beauty pageant 🍊🍊 judged by Hellen Keller🥰💫✨ I’ve seen you on tv!!🧚‍♂️💐🧚‍♀️✨ animal planet of course 🌷💖✨I love cows 🐄✨💫🌷 I just didn’t know they ran for president🐝🧚‍♂️🥰🌷
you’ve got everyone shook👁👄👁 8 on the Richter scale specifically. Lose some weight,
Fatty 🦍✨🌈🌷🌸
